name: Gemini 2.0 Pro Experimental
description: Experimental best-in-class Gemini model for coding and complex prompts. Supports huge 2M token context and advanced tool use including code execution and search.
notes: EXPERIMENTAL - Free via Google AI Studio. Best Gemini model for coding performance. Significant improvement over 2.0 Flash on benchmarks, especially SimpleQA (50% improvement). Advanced tool use capabilities.
